00027 int cimunit_event_table_entry_init(
00028   cimunit_event_table_entry_t *entry,
00029   cimunit_event_t *event)
00030 {
00031   entry->event = event;
00032   entry->thread = cimunit_thread_self();
00033   entry->next = NULL; 
00035   return 0;
00036 }

00038 int cimunit_event_table_entry_destroy(cimunit_event_table_entry_t *entry){
00039   //this is a no-op at the moment
00040 }

00042 int cimunit_event_table_init(
00043   cimunit_event_table_t *event_table, 
00044   const cimunit_thread_table_t *thread_table)
00045 {
00046   event_table->head = NULL;
00047   event_table->tail = NULL;
00048   event_table->thread_table = thread_table;
00049   cimunit_mutex_init(&(event_table->lock), NULL);
00051   return 0;
00052 }
00053 
00054 int cimunit_event_table_destroy(cimunit_event_table_t *event_table){
00055   cimunit_event_table_entry_t *current_entry = event_table->head;
00056   while(current_entry != NULL){
00057     event_table->head = current_entry->next;
00058     cimunit_event_table_entry_destroy(current_entry);
00059     free(current_entry);
00060     current_entry = event_table->head;
00061   }
00062   cimunit_mutex_destroy(&(event_table->lock));
00064   return 0;
00065 }
00066 
00067 int cimunit_add_event_to_table(
00068   cimunit_event_table_t *event_table,
00069   cimunit_event_t *event,
00070   cimunit_event_table_entry_t **entry_added)
00071 {
00072   cimunit_event_table_entry_t *new_entry = 
00073     (cimunit_event_table_entry_t*)malloc(sizeof(cimunit_event_table_entry_t));
00074   cimunit_event_table_entry_init(new_entry, event);
00075   cimunit_mutex_lock(&(event_table->lock));
00076   if(event_table->head == NULL){
00077     event_table->head = new_entry;
00078     event_table->tail = new_entry;
00079   }  
00080   else{
00081     event_table->tail->next = new_entry;
00082     event_table->tail = new_entry;
00083   }
00084   cimunit_mutex_unlock(&(event_table->lock));
00085 
00086   if(entry_added != NULL){
00087     (*entry_added) = new_entry;
00088   }
00090   return 0;
00091 }

00093 int cimunit_event_matches_table_entry(
00094   const cimunit_event_table_entry_t* table_entry,
00095   const cimunit_thread_table_t *thread_table,
00096   const char *event_name,
00097   const char *thread_name)
00098 {
00099   const char *thread_name_buffer;
00100   cimunit_get_thread_name(
00101     thread_table,
00102     table_entry->thread, 
00103     &thread_name_buffer);
00104 
00105   if (!strcmp(table_entry->event->event_name, event_name)) {
00106     if (thread_name) {
00107         return (thread_name_buffer &&
00108                 !strcmp(thread_name_buffer, thread_name));
00109     } else {
00110         return TRUE;
00111     }
00112   }
00113   
00114   return FALSE;
00115 }

00117 int cimunit_find_event_in_table(
00118   const cimunit_event_table_t *event_table,
00119   const char *event_name,
00120   cimunit_event_table_entry_t **found_event)
00121 {
00122   return cimunit_find_event_in_table_on_thread(
00123     event_table,
00124     event_name,
00125     NULL,
00126     found_event);
00127 }
00128 
00129 //Lord forgive this O(n) search
00130 int cimunit_find_event_in_table_on_thread(
00131   const cimunit_event_table_t *event_table,
00132   const char *event_name,
00133   const char *thread_name,
00134   cimunit_event_table_entry_t **found_event)
00135 {
00136   (*found_event) = event_table->head;
00137   while((*found_event) != NULL){
00138     if(cimunit_event_matches_table_entry(
00139       *found_event, event_table->thread_table,
00140        event_name, 
00141        thread_name))
00142     {
00143       break;
00144     }    
00145     (*found_event) = (*found_event)->next;
00146   }
00148   return 0;
00149 }
